entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of showers later this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
